Replies.Author: Gene
Replies.Content:
Crap man don’t post those nendroids they’ll eat my wallet ~\_~

Also

\>Tachibana Ruri(Kuroneko’s real name) and Gokou(Kuroneko’s real family name) Kanade

HNNNNNNGGGGGGG

Replies.Author: Chaeha
Replies.Content: I know, right? Nendoroids ARE children of the evil.

Replies.Author: Grant Walker
Replies.Content:
Wow, somehow I had no idea she had SO MANY roles. Most of them I still haven’t seen yet, but wow (I sort of feel like I say this every time you make one of these posts…).

I don’t blame you for featuring her again, either. I also really enjoy her voice acting, haha.

Replies.Author: Chaeha
Replies.Content: At first, I thought I’d just list all the roles, so I looked it up. There were so many of them. It would take at least Nadeko part’s length only with the names of roles she has done.

Replies.Author: Chaeha
Replies.Content: I just had to say this. People from Konachan.com must be fan of Hanazawa-san like me. Their previous first page showed Kanade, but now it’s Kuroneko wearing Kanade’s outfit.(The same picture I named as Tachibana Ruri)
